days.text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 northeasterly winds, becoming force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling significantly. Mainly cloudy. Force 5 to 6 northerly winds with gusts.
